awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: More than anything in the world, Sam Lawson wants to be a successful actor. Is he willing to sacrifice his wife, happiness and personal reputation to achieve his goal?

title: Career
